verses.verse: אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish There was a man הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah become בְאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> ve-'e-retz- in the land ע֖וּץ <S%H5780><s%> 'utz of Uz אִיּ֣וֹב <S%H347><s%> i-Yov [was] Job שְׁמ֑וֹ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo; whose name וְהָיָ֣ה׀ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become הָאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish and that man הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu, he תָּ֧ם <S%H8535><s%> tam was perfect וְיָשָׁ֛ר <S%H3477><s%> ve-ya-Shar and upright וִירֵ֥א <S%H3373><s%> vi-Re and one that feared אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God וְסָ֥ר <S%H5493><s%> ve-Sar and eschewed מֵרָֽע׃ <S%H7451><s%> me-Ra'. evil

וַיִּוָּ֥לְדוּ <S%H3205><s%> vai-yiv-Val-du And there were born ל֛וֹ lo שִׁבְעָ֥ה <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'Ah unto him seven בָנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> va-Nim sons וְשָׁל֥וֹשׁ <S%H7969><s%> ve-sha-Loosh and three בָּנֽוֹת׃ <S%H1323><s%> ba-Not. daughters

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become מִ֠קְנֵהוּ <S%H4735><s%> Mik-ne-hu His substance שִֽׁבְעַ֨ת <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'At also was seven אַלְפֵי־ <S%H505><s%> 'al-fei- thousand צֹ֜אן <S%H6629><s%> tzon sheep וּשְׁלֹ֧שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> u-she-Lo-shet and three אַלְפֵ֣י <S%H505><s%> 'al-Fei thousand גְמַלִּ֗ים <S%H1581><s%> ge-mal-Lim, camels וַחֲמֵ֨שׁ <S%H2568><s%> va-cha-Mesh and five מֵא֤וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred צֶֽמֶד־ <S%H6776><s%> tze-med- yoke בָּקָר֙ <S%H1241><s%> ba-Kar of oxen וַחֲמֵ֣שׁ <S%H2568><s%> va-cha-Mesh and five מֵא֣וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred אֲתוֹנ֔וֹת <S%H860><s%> a-to-Not, she asses וַעֲבֻדָּ֖ה <S%H5657><s%> va-'a-vud-Dah household רַבָּ֣ה <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bah great מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od; and a very וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become הָאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish so that this man הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu, he גָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol was the greatest מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kol of all בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of all the men קֶֽדֶם׃ <S%H6924><s%> Ke-dem. of the east

וְהָלְכ֤וּ <S%H1980><s%> ve-ha-le-Chu went בָנָיו֙ <S%H1121><s%> va-Nav And his sons וְעָשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Su and hold מִשְׁתֶּ֔ה <S%H4960><s%> mish-Teh, A feast בֵּ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> beit [in their] houses אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every one יוֹמ֑וֹ <S%H3117><s%> yo-Mo; his day וְשָׁלְח֗וּ <S%H7971><s%> ve-sha-le-Chu, and sent וְקָרְאוּ֙ <S%H7121><s%> ve-ka-re-'U and called לִשְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> lish-Lo-shet for their three; אַחְיֹתֵיהֶם 'ach-yo-tei-hem כאַחְיֹֽותֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H269><s%> 'ach-yo-tei-Hem, other קלֶאֱכֹ֥ל <S%H398><s%> le-'e-Chol to eat וְלִשְׁתּ֖וֹת <S%H8354><s%> ve-lish-Tot and to drink עִמָּהֶֽם׃ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-ma-Hem. with

וַיְהִ֡י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki When הִקִּיפֽוּ֩ <S%H5362><s%> hik-ki-Fu were gone about יְמֵ֨י <S%H3117><s%> ye-Mei And it was so when the days הַמִּשְׁתֶּ֜ה <S%H4960><s%> ham-mish-Teh of [their] feasting וַיִּשְׁלַ֧ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach sent אִיּ֣וֹב <S%H347><s%> i-Yov that Job וַֽיְקַדְּשֵׁ֗ם <S%H6942><s%> vay-kad-de-Shem, and sanctified וְהִשְׁכִּ֣ים <S%H7925><s%> ve-hish-Kim them and rose up early בַּבֹּקֶר֮ <S%H1242><s%> bab-bo-Ker in the morning וְהֶעֱלָ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> ve-he-'e-Lah and offered עֹלוֹת֮ <S%H5930><s%> 'o-lOt burnt offerings מִסְפַּ֣ר <S%H4557><s%> mis-Par [according] to the number כֻּלָּם֒ <S%H3605><s%> kul-Lam all כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> ki When אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar said אִיּ֔וֹב <S%H347><s%> i-Yov, of them all for Job אוּלַי֙ <S%H194><s%> 'u-Lai It may be חָטְא֣וּ <S%H2398><s%> cha-te-'U have sinned בָנַ֔י <S%H1121><s%> va-Nai, that my sons וּבֵרֲכ֥וּ <S%H1288><s%> u-ve-ra-Chu and cursed אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God בִּלְבָבָ֑ם <S%H3824><s%> bil-va-Vam; in their hearts כָּ֛כָה <S%H3602><s%> Ka-chah Thus יַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-Seh Thus did אִיּ֖וֹב <S%H347><s%> i-Yov Job כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַיָּמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> hai-ya-Mim. continually פ Peh

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi now there was הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom, Now there was a day וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u came בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei when the sons הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God לְהִתְיַצֵּ֖ב <S%H3320><s%> le-hit-yatz-Tzev to present עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; themselves before the LORD וַיָּב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo came גַֽם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- also הַשָּׂטָ֖ן <S%H7854><s%> has-sa-Tan and Satan בְּתוֹכָֽם׃ <S%H8432><s%> be-to-Cham. also among

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַשָּׂטָ֖ן <S%H7854><s%> has-sa-Tan unto Satan מֵאַ֣יִן <S%H370><s%> me-'A-yin Whence תָּבֹ֑א <S%H935><s%> ta-Vo; comest וַיַּ֨עַן <S%H6030><s%> vai-Ya-'an answered הַשָּׂטָ֤ן <S%H7854><s%> has-sa-Tan thou;Then Satan אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God וַיֹּאמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-Mar, and said מִשּׁ֣וּט <S%H7751><s%> mish-Shut From going to and fro בָּאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz, in the earth וּמֵֽהִתְהַלֵּ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> u-me-hit-hal-Lech and from walking up and down בָּֽהּ׃ Bah.

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַשָּׂטָ֔ן <S%H7854><s%> has-sa-Tan, unto Satan הֲשַׂ֥מְתָּ <S%H7760><s%> ha-Sam-ta appoint לִבְּךָ֖ <S%H3820><s%> lib-be-Cha care for עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and עַבְדִּ֣י <S%H5650><s%> 'av-Di my servant אִיּ֑וֹב <S%H347><s%> i-Yov; Job כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אֵ֤ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein is no כָּמֹ֙הוּ֙ <S%H3644><s%> ka-Mo-hu like בָּאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz, that [there is] none like him in the earth אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish man תָּ֧ם <S%H8535><s%> tam a perfect וְיָשָׁ֛ר <S%H3477><s%> ve-ya-Shar and an upright יְרֵ֥א <S%H3373><s%> ye-Re one that feareth אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God וְסָ֥ר <S%H5493><s%> ve-Sar and escheweth מֵרָֽע׃ <S%H7451><s%> me-Ra'. evil

וַיַּ֧עַן <S%H6030><s%> vai-Ya-'an answered הַשָּׂטָ֛ן <S%H7854><s%> has-sa-Tan Then Satan אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-Mar; and said הַֽחִנָּ֔ם <S%H2600><s%> ha-chin-Nam, free יָרֵ֥א <S%H3372><s%> ya-Re fear אִיּ֖וֹב <S%H347><s%> i-Yov Doth Job אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him. God

הֲלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ha-lo- not; אַתְּ 'at כאַ֠תָּה <S%H859><s%> 'At-tah you קשַׂ֣כְתָּ <S%H7753><s%> Sach-ta Hast not thou made an hedge בַעֲד֧וֹ <S%H1157><s%> va-'a-Do about him and about וּבְעַד־ <S%H1157><s%> u-ve-'ad- about בֵּית֛וֹ <S%H1004><s%> bei-To his house וּבְעַ֥ד <S%H1157><s%> u-ve-'Ad about כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after ל֖וֹ lo מִסָּבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> mis-sa-Viv; every מַעֲשֵׂ֤ה <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Seh the work יָדָיו֙ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dav of his hands בֵּרַ֔כְתָּ <S%H1288><s%> be-Rach-ta, abundantly וּמִקְנֵ֖הוּ <S%H4735><s%> u-mik-Ne-hu and his substance פָּרַ֥ץ <S%H6555><s%> pa-Ratz is increased בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz. in the land

וְאוּלָם֙ <S%H199><s%> ve-'u-Lam But שְֽׁלַֽח־ <S%H7971><s%> she-lach- put forth נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> na now יָֽדְךָ֔ <S%H3027><s%> ya-de-Cha, thine hand וְגַ֖ע <S%H5060><s%> ve-Ga' now and touch בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after ל֑וֹ lo; אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- lo לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and פָּנֶ֖יךָ <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nei-cha thee to thy face יְבָרֲכֶֽךָּ׃ <S%H1288><s%> ye-va-ra-Che-ka. curse

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַשָּׂטָ֗ן <S%H7854><s%> has-sa-Tan, unto Satan הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after לוֹ֙ lo בְּיָדֶ֔ךָ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-De-cha, Behold all that he hath [is] in thy power רַ֣ק <S%H7535><s%> rak but אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, about אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּשְׁלַ֖ח <S%H7971><s%> tish-Lach only upon himself put not forth יָדֶ֑ךָ <S%H3027><s%> ya-De-cha; thine hand וַיֵּצֵא֙ <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-Tze went forth הַשָּׂטָ֔ן <S%H7854><s%> has-sa-Tan, So Satan מֵעִ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> me-'Im from פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei from the presence יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וַיְהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom; And there was a day וּבָנָ֨יו <S%H1121><s%> u-va-Nav when his sons וּבְנֹתָ֤יו <S%H1323><s%> u-ve-no-Tav and his daughters אֹֽכְלִים֙ <S%H398><s%> 'o-che-Lim [were] eating וְשֹׁתִ֣ים <S%H8354><s%> ve-sho-Tim and drinking יַ֔יִן <S%H3196><s%> Ya-yin, wine בְּבֵ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> be-Veit house אֲחִיהֶ֥ם <S%H251><s%> 'a-chi-Hem brother's הַבְּכֽוֹר׃ <S%H1060><s%> hab-be-Chor. in their eldest

וּמַלְאָ֛ךְ <S%H4397><s%> u-mal-'Ach a messenger בָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> ba And there came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אִיּ֖וֹב <S%H347><s%> i-Yov unto Job וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-Mar; and said הַבָּקָר֙ <S%H1241><s%> hab-ba-Kar The oxen הָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu become חֹֽרְשׁ֔וֹת <S%H2790><s%> cho-re-Shot, were plowing וְהָאֲתֹנ֖וֹת <S%H860><s%> ve-ha-'a-to-Not and the asses רֹע֥וֹת <S%H7462><s%> ro-'ot feeding עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and יְדֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H3027><s%> ye-dei-Hem. beside

וַתִּפֹּ֤ל <S%H5307><s%> vat-tip-Pol fell שְׁבָא֙ <S%H7614><s%> she-Va And the Sabeans וַתִּקָּחֵ֔ם <S%H3947><s%> vat-tik-ka-Chem, [upon them] and took them away וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַנְּעָרִ֖ים <S%H5288><s%> han-ne-'a-Rim the servants הִכּ֣וּ <S%H5221><s%> hik-Ku yea they have slain לְפִי־ <S%H6310><s%> le-fi- with the edge חָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> Cha-rev; of the sword וָֽאִמָּ֨לְטָ֧ה <S%H4422><s%> va-'im-Mal-Tah and I only am escaped רַק־ <S%H7535><s%> rak- but אֲנִ֛י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I לְבַדִּ֖י <S%H905><s%> le-vad-Di alone לְהַגִּ֥יד <S%H5046><s%> le-hag-Gid alone to tell לָֽךְ׃ Lach.
